WITH rows AS ( INSERT INTO TBL_FRWL_APPLC ( ORG_SEQ , PPM_SEQ , DOMAIN) VALUES
(#{item.org_seq},#{ppm_seq},#{domain})
RETURNING seq, org_seq, ppm_seq, domain ) INSERT INTO tbl_frwl_applc_history (frwl_seq, org_seq, ppm_seq, domain, RGSTR_DATE ) SELECT seq, org_seq, ppm_seq, domain, now() FROM rows
mapper.select: SELECT array_to_string(array_agg(tua.ppm_seq),',')as ppm_seq FROM (SELECT distinct unnest(string_to_array(ppm_seq, ',')) ppm_seq FROM TBL_FRWL_APPLC WHERE ORG_SEQ in (with recursive search_org(domain,seq,p_seq,org_nm,org_ordr,section,level,path,cycle) as ( select a.domain,a.seq,a.p_seq,a.org_nm,a.org_ordr,a.section,0,array[a.seq],false from tbl_org a where a.seq = #{org_seq} and a.domain = #{domain} union all select b.domain,b.seq,b.p_seq,b.org_nm,b.org_ordr,b.section,level+1,path || b.seq,b.seq=any(path) from tbl_org b, search_org so where b.p_seq = so.seq and b.domain = so.domain and not cycle) select seq from search_org where 1=1 order by level,org_ordr) and domain = #{domain} )tua
